text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Hoh, hoh, you're saying you want our help?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Yeah! So I can beat Teio!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I heard her say she loses track of her pace 
when running with you two! So we should 
all run together and beat her!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ooh, a new apprentice? Let's quiz you real quick～☆ What's first business when the race starts?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Run as fast as I can!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: And at the end, Turbo wins!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Woohoo!! Turbo's awesome☆ 
Let's hit the track together!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
……? "At the end, Turbo wins?" 
Wait, you mean we're…… just there to lose?
